text: Roger Dorchy (born 5 September 1944) is a French former racing driver. He is known for holding the top speed record at the 24 Hours of Le Mans, setting a top speed of with a WM-Peugeot at the end of the Mulsanne Straight at the 1988 24 Hours of Le Mans. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:French racing drivers Category:24 Hours of Le Mans drivers
title: Roger Dorchy
